articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.title: Thousands Of ‘Destiny 2’ Players Honor Lance Reddick’s Zavala In The Tower - Forbes
articles.description: Lance Reddick, prolific actor from Oz, The Wire and John Wick, died at age 60 on Friday, reportedly of natural causes. But Destiny players know him from his nine years serving as Commander Zavala, the longest and most-used voice cast member of the series, and…
